thread.title: Wall Street sinks further in volatile trading as bond yields rise

title: Wall Street sinks further in volatile trading as bond yields rise
text:
Wall Street sinks further in volatile trading as bond yields rise Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 00:31 
U.S. stocks plunged again on Thursday in another trading session with big swings, as equities remained in a tug-of-war with bond yields, volatility remained high, and investors saw no relief ahead in finding the bottom of the market. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
